messages.subject: How unschooling works---no rant, just peaceful facts
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/14/2005 1:13:10 AM Mountain Standard Time, jimpetersonl@hotmail.com writes: This  doesn t hold up logically because the premises are
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/14/2005 1:13:10 AM Mountain Standard Time,
jimpetersonl@... writes:

This doesn't hold up logically because the premises are false.

Everyone is not a vegetarian.

A better premise would be Everyone eats.
Some people are able to be full time vegetarians.


============

Exactly so.

A better premise for you would have been everyone learns.
Everyone learns on his own, for fun or from need sometimes.
Some people do it fulltime and in fun ways.

And this list if for the benefit of people who want to do it fulltime as
well as they can.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
